content.html: Who wears a sleeveless dress in February? a) menopausal women, b) women who have taken their jacket off because they are hot c) women who spend every waking moment doing their job instead of thinking about their wardrobe and d) women who can because it’s nobody else’s business.
content.value: Who wears a sleeveless dress in February?  a) menopausal women, b) women who have taken their jacket off because they are hot c) women who spend every waking moment doing their job instead of thinking about their wardrobe and d) women who can because it’s nobody else’s business.
